job description:
Diversified Services Network, Inc. is seeking Data Analyst who will be responsible for working on a large data warehouse projects in the planning, development, support and maintenance for those projects. Responsibilities:Providing data analysis to support customers initiatives revolving around the data warehouse projectsInterpret data, analyze result using statistical techniques and providing ongoing reportsIdentify, analyze and interpret trends or patterns in complex data setsFilter and clean data by reviewing computer reports, printouts and performance indicators to locate and correct code problemsWork with management to prioritize business and information needsLocate and define new process improvement opportunitiesMandatory Qualifications:Candidate demonstrates experience using Microsoft SQL server to model data into data set for consumption of business intelligence softwareCandidate demonstrates expertise of data administration and management functions (collections, analysis, distribution ect.)Candidate demonstrate expertise gathering functional specification requirements for development of the dashboards and reportsCandidate demonstrates expertise with modern data warehouse and information system technologiesCandidate demonstrates experience with data security and privacy by anonymizing data setsDesired Qualifications:Experience with PARCC or SAT or KIDS or ISA or AccessExperience with high-stake reporting metrics within the field of educationExperience creating Data Quality DashboardExperience with State Report Card systemExperience with IBAM Rubric - provided by Dice SQL; Business Intelligence; Data warehouse; Data Security,
Associated topics: data administrator, data center, data engineer, data integration, data manager, data warehouse, data warehousing, etl, mongo database administrator, sql
